description: As a CSR Agent, I want the Billing View to be able to perform payment authorisation operations
name: Payment Authorisation functionality

elements.name: Payment Authorization module is displayed correctly and the form fields accept only the allowed inputs

steps.name: the CSR is logged in the Payment Authorisation screen
we are setting the prerequisite payment details for a UK customer
the Card Holder Name field accepts only valid inputs
the Card number field accepts only valid inputs
the Expiry Date field accepts only valid inputs
the Security Code field accepts only valid inputs
the Amount field is not editable
the Authorise payment button is enabled
the Start Date is not displayed
the Issue Number is not displayed
the agent changes the card number to one that requires the Start Date
the Start Date field accepts only valid inputs
the Issue Number is not displayed
the agent changes the card number to one that requires the Issue Number
the Issue Number accepts only valid inputs
the Start Date is not displayed

elements.name: The Billing View must be able to process Payment Authorisation functionality without charges

steps.name: the CSR is logged in the Payment Authorisation screen
we are setting the prerequisite payment details for a UK customer
the agent enters the Credit Card Number 4111111111111111 of type Visa
the Visa logo is displayed
the agent enters a valid security code 123
the agent changes the card holder name to Steven Wilson
the agent enters a valid expiry date 02/19
the Amount field is not editable
the Authorise payment button is clicked to finish the process
we can see the blank screen of successful payment authorisation

description: As a CSR Agent, I want the Billing View to be able to perform payment authorisation operations or to provide error messages through the Consumer Mock
name: Payment Authorisation functionality integration using the Consumer Mock

elements.name: The Billing View must be able to process Payment Authorisation functionality with charges and discounts using the Consumer Mock

steps.name: the CSR is logged in the Payment Authorisation screen using the Consumer Mock
internally aurora starts the interaction with the consumer
the consumer is setting the prerequisite payment details for a UK customer
the agent starts the interaction with the module
the agent selects 'Customer' as the owner of the card
the agent enters the Credit Card Number 5471420918342675 of type Master Card
the Master Card logo is displayed
the agent enters a valid security code 123
the agent changes the card holder name to Steven Wilson
the agent enters a valid expiry date 02/19
the Amount field is not editable
the Authorise payment button is clicked to finish the process
we can see the blank screen of successful payment authorisation

elements.name: The Billing View must be able to process Payment Authorisation functionality with charges and discounts using the Consumer Mock

steps.name: the CSR is logged in the Payment Authorisation screen using the Consumer Mock
internally aurora starts the interaction with the consumer
the consumer is setting the full payment details for a UK customer
the agent starts the interaction with the module
the agent selects 'Customer' as the owner of the card
the agent enters the Credit Card Number 5471420918342675 of type Master Card
the Master Card logo is displayed
the agent enters a valid security code 123
the agent changes the card holder name to Steven Wilson
the agent enters a valid expiry date 02/19
the Amount field is not editable
the Authorise payment button is clicked to finish the process
we can see the blank screen of successful payment authorisation

elements.name: When a Payment Authorisation is not authorised, the Billing View is displaying a specific error messages

steps.name: the CSR is logged in the Payment Authorisation screen using the Consumer Mock
internally aurora starts the interaction with the consumer
the consumer is setting the payment details with an amount of 3.33
the agent starts the interaction with the module
the agent selects 'Customer' as the owner of the card
the agent enters the Credit Card Number 4111111111111111 of type Visa
the agent enters a valid security code 123
the agent changes the card holder name to Steven Wilson
the agent enters a valid expiry date 02/19
the Authorise payment button is clicked to finish the process
the Payment Authorisation operation fails
the error message "Payment was not authorised as the card has been referred. Please retry using different payment details." is displayed within the Payment Authorisation screen

arguments.val: Payment was not authorised as the card has been referred. Please retry using different payment details.

elements.name: When a Payment Authorisation is not authorised, the Billing View is displaying a specific error messages

steps.name: the CSR is logged in the Payment Authorisation screen using the Consumer Mock
internally aurora starts the interaction with the consumer
the consumer is setting the payment details with an amount of 4.44
the agent starts the interaction with the module
the agent selects 'Customer' as the owner of the card
the agent enters the Credit Card Number 4111111111111111 of type Visa
the agent enters a valid security code 123
the agent changes the card holder name to Steven Wilson
the agent enters a valid expiry date 02/19
the Authorise payment button is clicked to finish the process
the Payment Authorisation operation fails

result.error_message:
org.junit.ComparisonFailure: expected:<[Payment was not authorised. Please retry using different payment details].> but was:<[There has been a system error, please try again. If this continues then please report this to your manager in case there is a wider issue].>

elements.name: Payment authorisation is not performed when there is an http error

steps.name: the CSR is logged in the Payment Authorisation screen using the Consumer Mock
internally aurora starts the interaction with the consumer
the consumer is setting the payment details for a customer with account number [621152689561]
the agent starts the interaction with the module
the agent selects 'Customer' as the owner of the card
the agent enters the Credit Card Number 4111111111111111 of type Visa
the agent enters a valid security code 123
the agent changes the card holder name to Test PAM
the agent enters a valid expiry date 07/19
the Authorise payment button is clicked to finish the process
there is an http 400 Payment Authorisation error
the Payment Authorisation operation fails

the error code "service.error" with the error message "Problem authorasing the payment. Please try again in a few moments and if the problem persist contact the system administrator." is received from the consumer

arguments.val: Problem authorasing the payment. Please try again in a few moments and if the problem persist contact the system administrator.

description: As a CSR Agent, I want the Billing View to be able to perform payment authorisation actions whilst connected to Semafone
name: Authorise payment using Semafone

elements.name: Agent can click reset whilst receiving card info from Semafone and this will clear the field

steps.name: the CSR is logged in the Payment Authorisation screen
we are setting the full payment details for a UK customer
the agent is connected to Semafone [with SemafoneCr 1051]
the agent clicks on the Credit Card Number input field
the agent clicks on the Reset All button
a reset request is sent

elements.name: Agent can click on the clear button whilst receiving security code info from Semafone and this will clear the field

steps.name: the CSR is logged in the Payment Authorisation screen
we are setting the full payment details for a UK customer
the agent is connected to Semafone [with SemafoneCr 1015]
the agent clicks on the Credit Card Number input field
the agent clicks on the Clear button to reset the Security Code field
a reset request is sent

elements.name: If the agent clicks on the Override button, the Override event is stored

steps.name: the CSR is logged in the Payment Authorisation screen
we are setting the full payment details for a UK customer
the agent is connected to Semafone [with SemafoneCr 1006]
the agent clicks on the Override button

the mute call instructions are displayed - "In Order to maintain BSkyB's compliance with mandatory industry requirements (PCI DSS) call recording must be manually muted before capturing payment card details vocally from the customer. Double click the Agent Management Console icon in your system tray (bottom of your monitor screen). Select "Mute Recording". Click Confirm to acknowledge that you have muted call recording."

arguments.val: In Order to maintain BSkyB's compliance with mandatory industry requirements (PCI DSS) call recording must be manually muted before capturing payment card details vocally from the customer. Double click the Agent Management Console icon in your system tray (bottom of your monitor screen). Select "Mute Recording". Click Confirm to acknowledge that you have muted call recording.

steps.name: the agent acknowledges the mute call message
the input fields become enabled
the agent enters the first six digits of a valid card number [411111]
the Visa logo is displayed
the agent enters the missing digits of the card number [1111111111]
the agent enters a valid expiry date 12/18
the agent changes the card holder name to Steven Wilson
the agent enters a valid security code 123
the agent enters a valid expiry date 02/19
the Amount field is not editable
the Authorise payment button is clicked to finish the process

the unmute call instructions are displayed - "For training and quality purposes you must resume call recording on completion of capturing payment details. Double click the Agent Management Console icon in your system tray (bottom of your monitor screen). Select "Start Recording". Click Confirm to acknowledge that you have un-muted call recording."

arguments.val: For training and quality purposes you must resume call recording on completion of capturing payment details. Double click the Agent Management Console icon in your system tray (bottom of your monitor screen). Select "Start Recording". Click Confirm to acknowledge that you have un-muted call recording.

steps.name: the agent acknowledges the unmute call message
we can see the blank screen of successful payment authorisation
the semafone events are successfully audited using the Genesys ID comming from Chordiant [Event: "Override"]

elements.name: Error message for invalid card details must be displayed the same way as for manual entry

steps.name: the CSR is logged in the Payment Authorisation screen
we are setting the full payment details for a UK customer
the agent is connected to Semafone [with SemafoneCr 1013]
the agent clicks on the Credit Card Number input field
there is an error in Semafone
the error message "An error has occurred and the details cannot be captured. Try again later" is displayed in the payment authorisation screen

arguments.val: An error has occurred and the details cannot be captured. Try again later

description: As a CSR Agent, I want the Billing View to store the corresponding payment authorisation Semafone Events in Chordiant database
name: Payment Authorisation Semafone Events

elements.name: If Semafone is in disaster recovery mode, the Manual event is stored

steps.name: the CSR is logged in the Payment Authorisation screen
we are setting the full payment details for a UK customer with an accountNumber [621142414526]
Semafone is in disaster recovery mode
the agent enters the Credit Card Number 4111111111111111 of type Visa
the agent changes the card holder name to Steven Wilson

steps.name: the agent enters a valid security code 123

comments.value: # this scenario need to be applied for the specified customer because it exists a mock for disaster recovery mode

elements.name: If the agent clicks on the Reset all button, the Reset event is stored with the Reset Type PAN

steps.name: the CSR is logged in the Payment Authorisation screen
we are setting the full payment details for a UK customer
the agent is connected to Semafone [with SemafoneCr 1036]
the agent clicks on the Credit Card Number input field
the customer starts entering the card details [************123]
the agent clicks on the Reset All button
the semafone events are successfully audited using the Genesys ID comming from Chordiant [Event: "Reset", Reset Type: "PAN"]

the agent clicks on the Credit Card Number input field

description: As a CSR Agent, I want the Billing View to display the payment authorisation screen according to the Semafone Status
name: Payment Authorisation Semafone Status

elements.name: If the agent is connected to the telephony and has the Semafone override button action, the Payment Authorisation screen uses Semafone and display the override button

steps.name: the CSR is logged in the Payment Authorisation screen
the agent has the Semafone override button action
we are setting the full payment details for a UK customer
the agent is connected to Semafone [with SemafoneCr 1002]
the Override button is displayed

elements.name: If the agent is not connected to the telephony and has the Semafone manual entry action, the Payment Authorisation screen doesn't use Semafone

steps.name: the CSR is logged in the Payment Authorisation screen
the agent has the Semafone manual entry action
we are setting the full payment details for a UK customer
the agent is not connected to Semafone for payment authorisation
the Override button is not displayed
the Reset buttons are not displayed
the agent clicks on the Credit Card Number input field
the agent can introduce manually a card number

elements.name: If the agent is connected to the telephony but doesn't have the Semafone override button action, the Payment Authorisation screen uses Semafone but doesn't display the override button

steps.name: the CSR is logged in the Payment Authorisation screen without the Semafone override button action
we are setting the full payment details for a UK customer
the agent is connected to Semafone [with SemafoneCr 1061]
the Override button is not displayed
the agent clicks on the Credit Card Number input field
the customer has entered the details of a valid Visa credit card using Semafone [************1111]

elements.name: If the agent is not connected to the telephony and doesn't have the Semafone manual entry action, the Payment Authorisation screen doesn't use Semafone and the pages display the use nothing message

steps.name: the CSR is logged in the Payment Authorisation screen without the Semafone manual entry action
we are setting the full payment details for a UK customer
the agent is not connected to Semafone for payment authorisation
the error message "Unable to locate active phone call, You are not authorised to enter manual payment details" is displayed within the Payment Authorisation screen

arguments.val: Unable to locate active phone call, You are not authorised to enter manual payment details

steps.name: the Payment Authorisation fields are all disabled

elements.name: If Semafone is in disaster recovery mode, the Payment Authorisation screen doesn't use Semafone and it can be used manually regardless the agent roles.

steps.name: the CSR is logged in the Payment Authorisation screen without the Semafone manual entry action
we are setting the full payment details for a UK customer with an accountNumber [621142414526]
Semafone is in disaster recovery mode

name: Authorise payment using Semafone and setting details in Aurora Mock from Aurora

elements.name: Aurora/Chordiant is providing Semafone details to the Payment Authorisation module, when the agent interacts with the module Semafone details are returned

steps.name: the CSR is logged in the Payment Authorisation screen using the Consumer Mock
Aurora provides Semafone details [with SemafoneCr 1001]
internally aurora starts the interaction with the consumer
the consumer is setting the full payment details for a UK customer
the agent starts the interaction with the module
the module gets Semafone details

elements.name: After Aurora provided Semafone details and PAM received data from Semafone, if the module is accessed again, Semafone details are asked again and refreshed

steps.name: the CSR is logged in the Payment Authorisation screen using the Consumer Mock
Aurora provides Semafone details [with SemafoneCr 1091]
the agent had a successful semafone journey for some payment details
the consumer is setting new semafone and new payment details [with SemafoneCr 1081]
the module gets new Semafone details

elements.name: Interacting with Aurora, agent can click on the clear button whilst receiving security code info from Semafone and this will clear the field

steps.name: the CSR is logged in the Payment Authorisation screen using the Consumer Mock
Aurora provides Semafone details [with SemafoneCr 1025]
internally aurora starts the interaction with the consumer
the consumer is setting the full payment details for a UK customer
the agent starts the interaction with the module
the agent clicks on the Credit Card Number input field
the agent clicks on the Clear button to reset the Security Code field
a reset request is sent

elements.name: Interacting with Aurora, if the agent clicks on the Reset all button, the Reset event is stored with the Reset Type PAN

steps.name: the CSR is logged in the Payment Authorisation screen using the Consumer Mock
Aurora provides Semafone details [with SemafoneCr 1036]
internally aurora starts the interaction with the consumer
the consumer is setting the full payment details for a UK customer
the agent starts the interaction with the module
the agent clicks on the Credit Card Number input field
the customer starts entering the card details [************123]
the agent clicks on the Reset All button
the semafone events are successfully audited using the Genesys ID comming from Chordiant [Event: "Reset", Reset Type: "PAN"]

elements.name: Interacting with Aurora, Error message for invalid card details must be displayed the same way as for manual entry

steps.name: the CSR is logged in the Payment Authorisation screen using the Consumer Mock
Aurora provides Semafone details [with SemafoneCr 1013]
internally aurora starts the interaction with the consumer
the consumer is setting the full payment details for a UK customer
the agent starts the interaction with the module
the agent clicks on the Credit Card Number input field
there is an error in Semafone
the error message "An error has occurred and the details cannot be captured. Try again later" is displayed in the payment authorisation screen

arguments.val: An error has occurred and the details cannot be captured. Try again later

name: ID&V Module - As An agent I want to be able to find customers by it's payment details so I can ID&V them by using those details

elements.name: When an agent with limited access role enters the ID&V website to perform a Payment Details Search, the limited radio button menu appears

steps.name: the CSR is logged in the ID&V website without the ID&V Search by Credit Card details action
the ID&V Payment Details Search page is displayed
"Sort Code" option is selected by default
"Sort Code" and "Bank account No." fields are displayed
the ID&V Search button is disabled
the Payment Details radio buttons menu appears with the 3 following options and for each option its related input fields:
output:
The inputOption and related fields to be asserted are : Sort Code
The inputOption and related fields to be asserted are : IBAN
The inputOption and related fields to be asserted are : UMR

elements.name: When an agent with unlimited access role enters the ID&V website to perform a Payment Details Search, the full radio button menu appears

steps.name: the CSR is logged in the ID&V website with the ID&V Search by Credit Card details action
the ID&V Payment Details Search page is displayed
the Payment Details radio buttons menu appears with the 4 following options and for each option its related input fields:
output:
The inputOption and related fields to be asserted are : Sort Code
The inputOption and related fields to be asserted are : Credit Card No.
The inputOption and related fields to be asserted are : IBAN
The inputOption and related fields to be asserted are : UMR

elements.name: When an agent with unlimited access role enters the ID&V website to perform a Payment Details Search, he has to provide an input value for the selected option to enable the search

steps.name: the CSR is logged in the ID&V website with the ID&V Search by Credit Card details action
the ID&V Payment Details Search page is displayed
the Payment Details radio buttons menu appears with the 4 following options:
the agent selects the IDV IBAN option
the agent enters a valid IDV IBAN "111222333"
the ID&V Search button is enabled
the agent clicks on the IDV search button
the "111222333" is not cleared in the field

elements.name: An agent enters the ID&V website and performs a successful Payment Details Search using the customer's sortcode

elements.name: An agent performs a customer search with  with a valid UMR search item type and send the result data to Aurora
